trends: There have been 27 other sightings in Gainesville
There were no other sightings in Gainesville on or around November 30th 2004
Summary: A cigar shaped glowing green with yellow circles like port holes moved diagonally down from the sky towards the earth.
divs: sighting detailsi apologize for not reporting this at the time. i have realized it was a mistake not to report it at the time, so i am reporting now. i worked as a courier at night in gainesville, so i drove around all night. in the area of ne 15th st between ne 23rd. ave and ne 39th ave, heading north on 15th, near 31st ave: first i saw a meteorite falling toward the earth in the middle of the night. i asked around and i found no one but myself who saw it. i looked in the newspaper the next day and there was no report. it was big and white fiery looking like a shooting star but much closer like it would land in or near the golf course on 39th ave., east of 15th st. i assumed it was a meteorite. i thought it would make a hole when it hit the ground that people would notice. some time later, approximately two or three months later,i saw another shooting star\meteorite in the same location at the same diagonal heading to the earth exactly the same. very strange. a couple months later, maybe three or four months, in the middle of the summer in 2005, i saw it a third time just the same. it looked white like a meteorite. but i had an experience that i can only describe metaphorically as my brain shifted gears. then i saw it was a cigar shaped object. glowing green like neon, with 4 yellow circles in a row that looked like windows. speeding down towards the earth like it might land in the vicinity of the golf course. maybe it would land farther away, but if so only a couple of miles. i am 5'10" tall. holding my arm fully extended, sizing the object up between my thumb and forefinger, i would have my thumb and finger about 3" apart. i was driving in the middle of the night north on ne 15th st. all three times i saw it. exactly the same location within a couple of blocks. heading down at a diagonal from high in the sky towards the earth. i saw it come out from behind trees, then disappear behind trees again, as 15th st is lined with tall trees. gainesville regional airport is on ne39th ave about 1 mile east of 15thst. but the object looked like it would land west of the airport, or northwest. it could not have been an airplane, because the object was heading approx. north or nnw. whereas airplanes coming in for a landing head either east or west to land on the runway. also the airport is closed in the middle of the night, unless an arriving flight is very delayed. i explain it to myself that the object was a craft, disguised as a shooting star. but since i saw it three times, on the third time, my brain was no longer tricked by the disguise, so i saw the true form and color. i did not hear any sounds any of the three times. i wonder what aliens are doing in gainesville. it is a provincial town despite the presence of the university of florida. i wonder why aliens would come to such a boring place when they have the whole world to explore. maybe they want to be near cape canaveral. i was a little afraid i would get in trouble for perceiving the true form, that somehow they would know i could see them, but nothing happened. i am glad they are not interested in me. soon after the third sighting i quit the courier job so i stopped driving around at night. my quitting my courier job had nothing to do with the sightings.
